article.heading: H3
article.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
paragraph: Q: How long does the taxi journey from Varanasi to Gaya take? A: The journey takes approximately 5-6 hours, depending on traffic and road conditions.
Q: Can I book a round-trip taxi from Varanasi to Gaya? A: Yes, most taxi operators offer both one-way and round-trip options.
Q: Are there any additional charges I should be aware of? A: Be sure to check for any additional charges such as tolls, parking fees, and waiting charges when booking your taxi.
